#labels Phase-Requirements
User stories for the Whisper IM project

=Week 1=

  * User can chat securely without error messages (Chris)
  * User can set status to "Away" (John)
  * User becomes idle after set amount of inactivity (Kirk) 
  * User can enable/disable logging (Cory)
  * ~~User can block/unblock another user (Nick)~~
  * User can select buddy by left click and then  toggle block status using a button on   toolbar (Nick)

=Future=
  * User can share public key information with other users
  * User will see updated buddy list when other users sign in or out
  * User is displayed account setup screen when starting program for first time
  * User can initiate talk with anyone regardless of "buddy" status
  * User can select "New IM" and be displayed a new window without selecting a buddy
